Maybe it's a problem with my VM (Windows 8.1 on Parallels Desktop), but I just tried to rebuild sdformat on my windows VM, and it's giving boost linking errors. I configured it with `Debug` build type and it finds boost during configure ([configure log here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/ecdd052a1a8501c8e32f)). However, it gives "unresolved external" linking errors like the following during build ([build log here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/46eac3ed03e1c0f3c356)):

~~~
Converter.cc.obj : error LNK2019:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __thiscall 
 boost::filesystem::directory_entry::directory_entry(void)" (__imp_??0directory_entry@filesystem@boost@@QAE@XZ)
 referenced in function "public: __thiscall boost::filesystem::detail::dir_itr_imp::dir_itr_imp(void)" (??0dir_itr_imp@detail@filesystem@boost@@QAE@XZ)
~~~
